Sect.P: I am a West Texas Native Applications Developer. Accustomed to developing in Windows and Linux environments. I am proficient in the latest version of Android Studio, Java, Unity3D, Adobe Creative Suite, and Eclipse. I work hard to meet deadlines and satisfy the needs of my co-workers and peers. Additionally I am easy-going and will prove a good friend and agreeable co-worker. I enjoy baseball, hiking, being creative and developing applications.
University of Texas of the Permian Basin, IRPE
